# Welcome {.unnumbered}

This book is an open-source collaborative project being run by NHS and Social Care and started by staff mostly from the UK Midlands region but is open to everyone to contribute to across the UK.

It is supported and enabled by:

[The NHS-R Community](https://nhsrcommunity.com/) which is hosted by [The Strategy Unit](https://www.strategyunitwm.nhs.uk/) part of [NHS Midlands and Lancashire Commissioning Support Unit](https://www.midlandsandlancashirecsu.nhs.uk/)

It is written using [Quarto](https://quarto.org/) and published (free) through GitHub.
